project.name: Survey Management System - Senior Level Product Services Analysis
project.description: Admin FE prostředí pro správa dotazníků - Senior Level capability impact analysis

user_requirements: Aplikace poskytne admin FE prostředí pro správa dotazníků business uživatelem/vlastníkem. Vytvoření nové šablony dotazníku, struktura ze známých elementů, bez dopadů do algoritmu vyhodnocení, typologie dotazníku, activace/deaktivace, preview funkce, kopírování šablon, export šablon, editace dotazníku, nová verze šablony, uživatelský changelog, porovnání verzí, smazání verzí pouze skrze deaktivaci, přístup přes role a AD integraci, funkční moduly pro obsluhu klientů a správu dotazníků, audit.
user_instructions: dont not forget on IT operations part

approach_adjustments: Expand to include IT operational requirements
Capture operational procedures alongside business changes
Include system administration and maintenance requirements

epic_requirements.A: Admin Frontend Environment - Provide administrative frontend environment for survey management by business users/owners
epic_requirements.B: Survey Template Creation - Creation of new survey templates with structure from known elements, without impact on evaluation algorithm
epic_requirements.C: Survey Typology Management - Survey typology definition and management capabilities
epic_requirements.D: Activation/Deactivation Controls - Survey template activation and deactivation functionality
epic_requirements.E: Preview Functionality - Survey preview capabilities for template validation
epic_requirements.F: Template Operations - Template copying and export functionality
epic_requirements.G: Survey Editing Capabilities - Survey template editing and modification features
epic_requirements.H: Version Management - New survey template version creation with user changelog
epic_requirements.I: Version Comparison - Comparison capabilities between different template versions
epic_requirements.J: Version Lifecycle Management - Version deletion only through deactivation (soft delete)
epic_requirements.K: Access Control Integration - Role-based access through AD integration
epic_requirements.L: Functional Modules - Functional modules for client service and survey management operations
epic_requirements.M: Audit Capabilities - Complete audit trail and logging functionality

key_findings: Product Management domain requires 26 of 41 total requirements (63%)
Critical audit requirements span across all management groups
High concentration in Product Directory (10 requirements) indicates new product category
IT operations emphasis captured through device management and transaction authorization
